permissions: User must be an admin to create RMT adjustments.
side_effects: Creates RMT adjustments for the specified raw material transactions; may update invoiced RMTs when update_if_invoiced is true.
validation_notes: --rmt-ids, --note, and --raw-data-adjustments are required. --rmt-ids cannot be empty and must reference existing raw material transaction IDs. --raw-data-adjustments must be a JSON object; only allowed adjustment fields are is_voided, gross_weight, net_weight, tare_weight, tonnage, units_sold, ticket_at, and gross_rate. For each provided adjustment field, a corresponding reason field <field>_by_xbe_reason is required.

flags.name: --rmt-ids
flags.description: Raw material transaction IDs (required, comma-separated or repeated)
flags.validation: Required; comma-separated or repeated; blank entries are rejected; IDs must exist.

flags.name: --raw-data-adjustments
flags.validation: Required; must be valid JSON object with only allowed fields; each adjustment field requires a corresponding <field>_by_xbe_reason.
